# `Shizu_State_destroy`

*Description*
The opaque type representing the *state* of the runtime.

*Signature*
```
typedef struct <implementation> Shizu_State;
```

*Details*
See [Shizu_State_create](Shizu_State_create.md) and [Shizu_State_destroy](Shizu_State_destroy.md) for more information.
